name: All in One Accessibility
author: Skynet Technologies USA LLC

sections.description:
Quick WordPress Website Accessibility Remediation with All in One Accessibility plugin!

The All in One Accessibility widget improves WordPress website ADA compliance and browser experience for ADA, WCAG 2.1 & 2.2, Section 508, California Unruh Act, Australian DDA, European EAA EN 301 549, UK Equality Act (EA), Israeli Standard 5568, Ontario AODA, Canada ACA, German BITV, France RGAA, Brazilian Inclusion Law (LBI 13.146/2015), Spain UNE 139803:2012, JIS X 8341 (Japan), Italian Stanca Act and Switzerland DDA Standards.

Screen Reader, Voice Navigation, Dictionary, Virtual Keyboard, Accessibility Profiles, Sign language Libras (Brazilian Portuguese) Custom Widget Color, Icon size, Position, GA4 Tracking and custom accessibility statement link are the top features.

AI Widget Supports 140 Languages and Voice Over. It is flexible & lightweight widget that can be changed according to law and reduces the risk of time-consuming accessibility lawsuits.

Follows the best industry practices and standards ISO 9001:2015 & ISO 27001:2013 and complies with GDPR, COPPA regulations. Member of W3C and International Association of Accessibility Professionals (IAAP).

Our AI automatically remediates images Alternative text and uses the accessibility interface which handles UI and design related adjustments. All in One Accessibility app enhances your WordPress website accessibility to people with hearing or vision impairments, motor impaired, color blind, dyslexia, cognitive & learning impairments, seizure and epileptic, and ADHD problems.

Following features can be added as an addon

  • White Label service
  • Custom Branding
  • Live Site translates
  • Customize Accessibility Menu/widget
  • Accessibility Monitoring
  • PDF / Word Document Remediation

Here’s a comprehensive feature guide.

WordPress All in One Accessibility Pro (70 plus Features):

SCREEN READER

  • Read Page
  • Reading Mask
  • Read Mode
  • Reading Guide

SKIP LINKS

  • Skip to Menu
  • Skip to Footer
  • Skip to Navigation
  • Open Accessibility Toolbar

CONTENT ADJUSTMENTS

  • Content Scaling
  • Dyslexia Fonts
  • Readable Fonts (Legible Fonts)
  • Highlight Title
  • Highlight Links
  • Text Magnifier
  • Adjust Font Sizing
  • Adjust Line Height
  • Adjust Letter Spacing
  • Align Center
  • Align Left
  • Align Right

COLOR AND CONTRAST ADJUSTMENTS

  • Dark Contrast

  • Light Contrast
  • High Saturation
  • High Contrast
  • Smart Contrast
  • Low Saturation
  • Invert Colors
  • Adjust Background Colors
  • Adjust Text Colors
  • Adjust Title Colors

ORIENTATION ADJUSTMENTS

  • Mute Sounds

  • Stop Animation
  • Highlight Hover
  • Highlight Focus
  • Big Black Cursor

  • Filter Content

ACCESSIBILITY PROFILES

sections.reviews:
The plugin provides several accessibility profile options!

By joeltalamo on March 27, 2024

Compared to other plugins I have previously used, this plugin offers a greater variety of features within an affordable plan.

ADA Compliance Made Simple.

By rickswartz on March 20, 2024

This plugin offering a wide range of features and maintaining a professional accessibility standard throughout. It's a reliable choice, with a commitment to ensuring web accessibility for everyone.

Does nothing without payment

By Code Muffin on March 14, 2024

This plugin does nothing by itself. You have to sign up for the plan. The settings page is just a sign-up form to submit your details..

There's a "10 day free trial" but it requires credit card info and auto charges you after the 120 days.

So basically, useless unless you sign up and pay after 10 days, it's completely useless. And the cheapest plan starts at $250 p/year, so it's not cheap either.

Versatile and feature rich plugin!

By charlessmith09 on March 7, 2024

This plugin was a breeze to install and incredibly useful for ensuring our site is accessible to all users. The support team provided fantastic assistance in setting up the accessibility statement. I wholeheartedly recommend this plugin to anyone looking to improve website accessibility.

Quick, easy, and cost-effective

By markbennett3 on February 24, 2024

I strongly endorse this plugin for its remarkable features, easy and quick installation - all at a super budget-friendly cost.

Delivering an exceptional accessibility experience

By markianboofey on February 13, 2024

By incorporating this plugin, my website complies with both the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) and Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG). Its user-friendly features and extensive capabilities have significantly pleased me.

Quite easy, simple and very quick.

By robertwest11 on February 7, 2024

As I explored this plugin, I found that it has many useful features for those who need digital accessibility assistance. Our team was thrilled with how it improved our website's accessibility.

Absolutely beneficial plugin.

By robertwest2 on January 25, 2024

It's great to have this plugin! I have been using it for a few months, and it has been great. Customer service is also top-notch. Definitely, worth a try.

Helpful to make my website, Accessible!

By edwardbelle on January 11, 2024

This plugin is highly valuable as it encompasses all the essential features required to enhance the accessibility of my website to a wider audience.

Enhance my website's accessibility.

By evansandrew on November 29, 2023

This plugin is highly valuable as it encompasses all the essential features required to enhance the accessibility of my website to people with disability. It is fully compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) and Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) for online vendors.

description:
Quick WordPress Website Accessibility Remediation with All in One Accessibility plugin!

The All in One Accessibility widget improves WordPress website ADA compliance and browser experience for ADA, WCAG 2.1 & 2.2, Section 508, California Unruh Act, Australian DDA, European EAA EN 301 549, UK Equality Act (EA), Israeli Standard 5568, Ontario AODA, Canada ACA, German BITV, France RGAA, Brazilian Inclusion Law (LBI 13.146/2015), Spain UNE 139803:2012, JIS X 8341 (Japan), Italian Stanca Act and Switzerland DDA Standards.

Screen Reader, Voice Navigation, Dictionary, Virtual Keyboard, Accessibility Profiles, Sign language Libras (Brazilian Portuguese) Custom Widget Color, Icon size, Position, GA4 Tracking and custom accessibility statement link are the top features.

AI Widget Supports 140 Languages and Voice Over. It is flexible & lightweight widget that can be changed according to law and reduces the risk of time-consuming accessibility lawsuits.

Follows the best industry practices and standards ISO 9001:2015 & ISO 27001:2013 and complies with GDPR, COPPA regulations. Member of W3C and International Association of Accessibility Professionals (IAAP).

Our AI automatically remediates images Alternative text and uses the accessibility interface which handles UI and design related adjustments. All in One Accessibility app enhances your WordPress website accessibility to people with hearing or vision impairments, motor impaired, color blind, dyslexia, cognitive & learning impairments, seizure and epileptic, and ADHD problems.

Following features can be added as an addon

  • White Label service
